## General

-   Hero Selection now displays Tier XI Regalia alongside the Tier I
    Regalia
-   The DPS Dummy no longer classifies true damage as physical DPS for
    tracking
-   *Barbarians* initial mana value is now a non-zero value

## Bug Fixes

-   The `-s` and `-save` commands now correctly saves the
    `_lastsave.txt` file to the intended `v1.39` subfolder
-   *Book of Skill Increase* descriptions for *Shatter* (Guardian of
    Nature), *Freezing Field* (Magician), and *Soul-Piercing Shot*
    (Ranger) are now correct
-   *Book of Skill Increase* and *Book of Skill Reset* now works for
    *Strafe* (Ranger)
-   An internal change to timer functionality for 'old' code has been
    reverted
-   *Book of Skill Increase - Level 6* now spawns as intended for
    *Infuriate* (Barbarian) and *Strafe* (Ranger)
-   Native XP floating text tags are now properly hidden as intended
-   *Wizard's Respite* correctly grants 30 mana regeneration per second
    instead of 30 health regeneration per second
-   The DPS Dummy displays the correct icon for *Ironwood Set*
-   The "level up" FX now occurs again
